rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, you may create two 1/1 Horror creature tokens that are all colors. If you do, conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
